## useThemeController() function

User's integrate theme controller

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useThemeController(options?: ThemeControlOptions): {
    current: RemovableRef<string>;
    isDark: import("vue").ComputedRef<boolean>;
    isLight: import("vue").ComputedRef<boolean>;
    setTheme: (theme?: ThemeType) => void;
    switchTheme(): void;
    onThemeChange: EventHookOn<string>;
    defineTheme: typeof defineTheme;
};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | ThemeControlOptions | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

{ current: RemovableRef&lt;string&gt;; isDark: import("vue").ComputedRef&lt;boolean&gt;; isLight: import("vue").ComputedRef&lt;boolean&gt;; setTheme: (theme?: ThemeType) =&gt; void; switchTheme(): void; onThemeChange: EventHookOn&lt;string&gt;; defineTheme: typeof defineTheme; }
